about_text: Sanctus is an app where you can find the daily liturgy, the saint of the day, novenas, rosaries and prayer plans, all in one place and in a practical way so that you can pray at any time of the day.
features_one_text: Listen to what God has to say every day through the first reading, psalm, second reading and gospel and meditate inspired by the words of Pope Francis.
features_two_text: Have access to over 150 prayers, including chaplets and novenas. The content is arranged in a simple and practical way that allows you to focus entirely on prayer and be in communion with God. In addition, all individual prayers and chaplets are available in audio.
features_three_text: Through daily plans, meditate on the word of God according to the moment you are living, or read the whole story of the life of Jesus told in the four Gospels.
